about_the_game:
Enjoy the eclectic tunes of Otem's Defiance in this DLC! includes all original in-game tracks plus a couple of covers made by collaborators.

Track List:

  • 01 - Crystal Ring Theme
  • 02 - Vortex Ring Theme
  • 03 - Treetop Ring Theme
  • 04 - Molten Ring Theme
  • 05 - Miniboss Theme
  • 06 - Final Boss theme
  • 07 - Final Boss Piano Cover
  • 08 - Theme Song Electronic Cover
  • 09 - Act 1 - Lore
  • 10 - Act 2 - Ritual
  • 11 - Act 3 - Sacrifice
  • 12 - Act 4 - Enough
  • 13 - Act 5 - Foolish Kid
  • 14 - Act 6 - Rematch
  • 15 - Act 7 - Rejection
  • 16 - Act 8 - Revelation
  • 17 - Act 9 - Not This Time
  • 18 - Act 10 - Freedom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or similar
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or similar
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32 bit
  • Processor: Windows 7 32 bit
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or similar
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card
